Package org.numenta.nupic.serialize

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTMObjectInput  
    HTMObjectInputOutputTest  
    HTMObjectOutput  
    SerialConfig
    Used to configure a NetworkSerializer with details regarding file formats, save locations, file opening conventions, and underlying serialization library, among other things.
    SerializerCore
    PeristenceAPI underbelly which uses the FST Fast Serialization library to serialize various HTM.java object.
    SerializerCoreTest
